doc.title: Karen
doc.plot: To keep her cheerleading squad together, Ryo acccepts a challenge from her team members - she must cheer perfectly with a vibrating dildo inside her. She passes the challenge, but the game's not over yet. After the cheerleaders drag her against her will into a lickfest, she is then challenged to gangbang the entire rugby team. Will Ryo be able to complete the neverending challenges and remain the cheerleading captain?
